title: Add test coverage for core/install package (6.2% coverage)
description: The internal/core/install package has only 6.2% coverage. This is critical installation logic. Need tests for: ExtractAsset(), extractTar(), extractZip(), DownloadAsset(), getExtractPath(). Create test fixtures with sample tar.gz and zip files. Verify extraction, symlink creation, and error handling. Target: >80% coverage.

title: Fix TestGetDefaultDBPath failing test
description: The TestGetDefaultDBPath test in internal/database/connection_test.go:44 is failing because the test assertion expects '.local', 'share', and '.binmate' to be present but the path contains 'binmate' without the dot prefix. Update test assertion to match actual path pattern: /home/vscode/.local/share/binmate/user.db

title: Add test coverage for GitHub provider package (51.7% → 80%)
description: The internal/providers/github package has 51.7% coverage with only filter tests. Missing critical tests for: FetchReleaseAsset() (0%), DownloadAsset() (0%). Need to mock GitHub API with httptest, test release fetching, asset downloading, rate limiting, and error scenarios. Target: >80% coverage.

title: Fix issue installing manually added binary (CLI or TUI)
description: When a new binary is manually added either via the CLI or TUI and is not present within the local config file, subsequent installations will fail.

title: Add integration tests for complete workflows
description: Currently only unit tests exist. Need integration tests for full workflows: 1) Install workflow (download → extract → symlink → DB), 2) Version switching, 3) Uninstall, 4) Update, 5) Config sync. These tests ensure all components work together correctly. Create test suite in internal/integration/ directory.

title: Move GetDefaultDateFormat call in view_versions outside for loop
description: Calling it once outside the loop is more efficient than potentially calling it for each installation when config format is empty

title: Add test coverage for crypto/checksum package (0% coverage)
description: The internal/core/crypto package has 0% test coverage. This is critical as it handles security-sensitive checksum verification. Need to create tests for: ComputeSHA256(), VerifySHA256(), ComputeDigest(), and VerifyDigest(). Test with known SHA256 hashes and verify both success and failure cases.

title: Implement config.json sync with database
description: The config.json file should be synced with the database on startup. Need to modify internal/core/config/read_config.go to call binaries_repository.SyncFromConfig() after reading the config file. This ensures binaries defined in config.json are properly registered in the database. See schema.plan.md Phase 3 for details.

title: Optimize installations query with WHERE filter
description: In internal/database/repository/installations.go line 166, there's a TODO suggesting that filtering could be done with a WHERE clause instead of in-memory filtering. Review the GetByBinaryWithActive or similar query methods and optimize to push filtering to SQL WHERE clause for better performance.

title: Add test coverage for database repository package (0% coverage)
description: The internal/database/repository package has 0% coverage despite being critical for data persistence. Need comprehensive tests for all repositories (binaries, installations, versions, downloads, logs). Test CRUD operations, foreign key constraints, cascade deletes, and concurrent access. Target: >80% coverage.

title: Add test coverage for install CLI command (0% coverage)
description: The internal/cli/install command has 0% coverage despite being the primary user-facing command. Need to test: install command parsing, flag handling, integration with core install package, error handling. Mock database and provider layers. Target: >70% coverage.

title: Implement proper regex filtering for GitHub releases
description: The FetchReleaseAsset function in internal/providers/github/fetch_release_asset.go currently uses substring matching instead of proper regex for releaseRegex field. Need to implement regexp.Compile and use actual regex matching to properly filter releases based on user-defined patterns in config.json.

title: Implement binary alias override functionality
description: The Binary struct in internal/core/config/config.go has an Alias field that should allow overriding the binary name used for symlinks. Currently marked as TODO. Need to implement this in the version management code (set_active_version.go) to use the alias instead of the name when creating symlinks.

title: Complete uninstall functionality - delete physical files and symlinks
description: The Uninstall method in internal/core/binary/service.go currently only removes database records but does not delete the physical files and symlinks when removeFiles is true. This creates disk space leaks. Need to implement file/symlink deletion for installed versions at the configured install path.

title: Implement binary import functionality
description: The ImportBinary method in internal/core/binary/service.go is currently a stub. Need to implement functionality to import existing binaries into binmate management. This should: 1) Detect binary location and version, 2) Create database record, 3) Optionally move to managed location, 4) Create symlinks. See .github/plan.md Phase 5 for requirements.

title: Add test coverage for config package (9.3% coverage)
description: The internal/core/config package has only 9.3% coverage. Config parsing is essential for app functionality. Need tests for: ReadConfig(), GetBinary(). Test valid/invalid config.json, missing files, malformed JSON, schema validation. Only SyncToDatabase currently has tests. Target: >80% coverage.

title: Implement cross-platform path handling for Windows
description: The database connection in internal/database/connection.go uses hardcoded .local/share path which doesn't work on Windows. Need to implement OS-aware path resolution that uses appropriate directories for Linux/macOS/Windows. Consider using go-appdir or similar library for XDG Base Directory specification compliance.
